channel.title: Command to go completely stealth?
channel.description:
::hide or ::invisible
So you can spy on people, with your dot being taken off the minimap?

item.title: Command to go completely stealth?
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“Lil Tyrone, post:4, topic:421036”][code]

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:99: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable hidden
location: class server.model.players.Player
Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].hidden = true
;
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code][/quote]
You don’t have the hidden variable. That’s what you get for copy and pasting.

item.title: Command to go completely stealth?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Lil Tyrone, post:1, topic:421036”]::hide or ::invisible

So you can spy on people, with your dot being taken off the minimap?[/quote]

I suppose all you would have to do is set a variable (ie. “hidden”), and then when updating the appearance of players, if the player is flagged as hidden, skip them, so that the client never knows that someone is there.

Interesting concept really. I may make a tutorial on how to add it to any base.

Read full topic

item.title: Command to go completely stealth?
item.dc:creator: @50percentelf 50percentelf
item.description:
@50percentelf wrote:

PI base.

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("hide") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("xxxxxx1") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("xxxxxx3") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("50percentelf") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("xxxxxx2"))) {
			c.sendMessage("You are now hidden from all players.");
			Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].hidden = true;			
		}

Read full topic
